VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: To infinity...
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description:
...and beyond!

Highly advanced thrusters allow marines to traverse quarter of a planet in a matter of minutes.

4 launches total, after that thrusters require refueling.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: To infinity...
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description:
...and beyond!

Advanced thrusters allow marines to traverse considerable distance in a matter of minutes.

2 launches total, after that thrusters require refueling.
